span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 校验，证实： to determine or test the truth or accuracy of, as by comparison, investigation, or reference
【例】 We need to verify your passport. 我们需要校验阁下的护照。
【近】 attest, authenticate, certify, corroborate, substantiate, support, validate, vindicate
【反】 disprove, rebut, refute 反驳，驳斥
【派】 verified adj. 经证实的；verification n. 证实

【记】 very 真 + fy使，证实为真的
